description:
Are you an intense espresso, always on the run with sharp comebacks? Or a Frappuccino with extra caramel, who adores drama and selfies in perfect lighting? Maybe you're a mysterious Caramel Macchiato, who doesn't reply to messages for 3 days? Take the quiz and find out if your soul is more oat milk, vegan whipped cream, or... a double shot of chaos! ğŸ˜„â€¼ï¸â€¼ï¸ Warning: Results may cause coffee cravings and existential crises related to toppings.
